title: Fan
provenance_text:
Miss A. G. Larter or Miss B. M. Kendall, until November 16, 1915 [1]; (sold at American Art Association, New York, NY, November 16, 1915); purchased by Herbert DuPuy [1856-1930], Pittsburgh, PA, November 16, 1915; gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, November 1927. 
NOTES: [1] The sale of the "Misses A. G. Larter and B. M. Kendall" happened at the American Art Association gallery on November 16, 1915. It is unclear at this time if the sale was the sale of two separate individuals, or a joint estate, or another situation. Research is ongoing.
